content.rendered:
Contact us

U.S. Merck corporate headquarters

See all locations

Our corporate headquarters is located at:

126 East Lincoln Avenue
P.O. Box 2000
Rahway, NJ 07065 USA

To reach a Merck employee, please call:

1-908-740-4000
Monday – Friday, 8:30 am – 5:30 pm ET

Worldwide offices

To learn about our operations in Canada, visit www.merck.ca. For outside of the U.S. and Canada, Merck is known as MSD. For contact information, please visit here.

Products & services and adverse event reporting

For information about Merck’s products and services including the reporting of an adverse event or product quality complaint with a specific Merck product, please call the Merck National Service Center:

1-800-444-2080
Monday – Friday, 8:00 am – 7:00 pm ET

You can call this number 24/7 for any product-related emergency

Do you need help paying for your medications?

See programs

We understand that many things can add to the stress of medical treatment. If you are unable to afford your prescribed medications, we may be able to help you. See what programs are available to eligible patients in the U.S.

Investors

All investors contact

For investor questions:

Call: +1 908-740-1468

Email: investor_relations@merck.com

Media

All media contacts

For general media questions:

Call: +1 908-740-5633

Email: mediarelations@merck.com

Suppliers

See help desk contact list

To inquire about invoice and payment issues, please contact the appropriate country’s help desk.

Merck Animal Health

Visit Merck Animal Health website

If you are based in the USA and have questions on our products or our organization, please visit the Merck Animal Health USA contact page.

If you are outside the USA, please send an email to: animal-health-communications@merck.com

Our Merck Animal Health headquarters is located at:

2 Giralda Farms
Madison, NJ 07940 USA

Contact information for Stockholders and Investors is available here.
